channel.title: Can't get on my server? Tells me to register first?
channel.description:
This is what it says in my run.bat:
[code]
C:\Documents and Settings\Me\Desktop\Prunescape\firescape\Server>set PATH=C:\Pro gram Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;;C:\Program Files\Panda Security\Panda Antivirus Pro 2009\;C:\apache-ant-1.7.1\bin;C:\apache-ant-1.7.1\bin
C:\Documents and Settings\Me\Desktop\Prunescape\firescape\Server>set JAVA_HOME=D :\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_5\bin\javaw.exe 1.6.0_05
C:\Documents and Settings\Me\Desktop\Prunescape\firescape\Server>ant demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; de monikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demo nikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demoni kp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp 2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; demonikp2p ; Buildfile: build.xml
demonikp2p: [java] [18:02:47 06-09-09] Server starting up... [java] .\conf [java] [18:02:49 06-09-09] Communications link failure due to underlying ex ception: [java] [java] ** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION ** [java] [java] java.net.SocketException [java] MESSAGE: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect [java] [java] STACKTRACE: [java] [java] java.net.SocketException: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refu sed: connect [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFa ctory.java:156) [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:284) [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2565) [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1485) [java] [18:02:49 06-09-09] Connected to MySQL [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDri ver.java:266) [java] at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582) [java] at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185) [java] at com.rscd.sql.DatabaseManager.getDatabaseConnection(DatabaseMa nager.java:34) [java] at com.rscd.Server.main(Server.java:52) [java] [java] [java] ** END NESTED EXCEPTION ** [java] [java] [java] [java] Last packet sent to the server was 16 ms ago. [java] [18:02:50 06-09-09] com.rscd.packethandler.ProcessNameHandler [java] [18:02:50 06-09-09] GameEngine now running [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] [18:02:50 06-09-09] The server encountered an error while unfreezing players [java] at com.rscd.Server.main(Server.java:59) [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at com.rscd.io.PlayerLoader.loadPlayer(PlayerLoader.java:25) [java] at com.rscd.model.Player.load(Player.java:933) [java] at com.rscd.packethandler.PlayerLogin.handlePacket(PlayerLogin.j ava:50) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(GameEngine.java:38 1) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:197) [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at com.rscd.io.PlayerLoader.loadPlayer(PlayerLoader.java:25) [java] at com.rscd.model.Player.load(Player.java:933) [java] at com.rscd.packethandler.PlayerLogin.handlePacket(PlayerLogin.j ava:50) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(GameEngine.java:38 1) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:197) [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at com.rscd.io.PlayerLoader.loadPlayer(PlayerLoader.java:25) [java] at com.rscd.model.Player.load(Player.java:933) [java] at com.rscd.packethandler.PlayerLogin.handlePacket(PlayerLogin.j ava:50) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(GameEngine.java:38 1) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:197) [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at com.rscd.io.PlayerLoader.loadPlayer(PlayerLoader.java:25) [java] at com.rscd.model.Player.load(Player.java:933) [java] at com.rscd.packethandler.PlayerLogin.handlePacket(PlayerLogin.j ava:50) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(GameEngine.java:38 1) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:197) [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at com.rscd.io.PlayerLoader.loadPlayer(PlayerLoader.java:25) [java] at com.rscd.model.Player.load(Player.java:933) [java] at com.rscd.packethandler.PlayerLogin.handlePacket(PlayerLogin.j ava:50) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(GameEngine.java:38 1) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:197) [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at com.rscd.io.PlayerLoader.loadPlayer(PlayerLoader.java:25) [java] at com.rscd.model.Player.load(Player.java:933) [java] at com.rscd.packethandler.PlayerLogin.handlePacket(PlayerLogin.j ava:50) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(GameEngine.java:38 1) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:197) [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at com.rscd.io.PlayerLoader.loadPlayer(PlayerLoader.java:25) [java] at com.rscd.model.Player.load(Player.java:933) [java] at com.rscd.packethandler.PlayerLogin.handlePacket(PlayerLogin.j ava:50) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(GameEngine.java:38 1) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:197) [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at com.rscd.io.PlayerLoader.loadPlayer(PlayerLoader.java:25) [java] at com.rscd.model.Player.load(Player.java:933) [java] at com.rscd.packethandler.PlayerLogin.handlePacket(PlayerLogin.j ava:50) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(GameEngine.java:38 1) [java] at com.rscd.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:197)
[/code]
When I run the client, it says it's off. I think I might need to edit the client to make it connect to my ip, but i'm not sure.
help?

item.title: Can't get on my server? Tells me to register first?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:14, topic:300588”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=396849.msg2947667#msg2947667 date=1252287065]

k, reanme the www file in the source to htdocs then goto where you installed xampp (default c:/xampp) deleat the htdocs folder in c:/xampp and then copy and paste the www file that you renamed into c:/xampp. Then goto http://localhost/phpmyadmin and on the top tab hit import and import the demonik_lsd file that should be in your source file. After your done that goto http://localhost and register the name you want and login.

The links just lead me to blank pages

Oh, make sure you have your xampp running.

It’s running.

Those looks don’t look right to me, do they work for you?
[/quote]

Good morning lol. Figured everything out?[/quote]
Sadly not. I’m kinda busy today, last day of summer

Read full topic
item.source: Can't get on my server? Tells me to register first?

Do you have your webserver (xampp, wamp…whatever you use) running?

Hehe, its fine. Have you downloaded a webserver package off the internet yet? If no then google up xampp or wamp and download whatever.[/quote]

oh thanks, downloading right now.

EDIT: Rep++ for you :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2009, 04:37:02 pm[/size][hr]Ok, Now it says to register at the forums of the source, and I can’t get on. How would I fix this?
